extends java.lang.Object
    Class for managing players.

    • Method Detail

      • addPlayer

        public static void addPlayer(Player player)
        Registers a player to the Collection of players. Notifies all the plugins generating a PlayerJoinEvent. Adds the player to the list on the left of the GUI.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to register

      • removePlayer

        public static void removePlayer(Player player,
                                java.lang.String reason)
        Removes a player from the Collection of players. Notifies all the plugins generating a PlayerDisconnectEvent. Removes the player from the list on the left of the GUI.
        Parameters:
        player - The player getting removed
        reason - The reason why the players is removed

      • get

        public static Player get(java.lang.String name)
                  throws PlayerException
        Receives a name and returns a Player that was the same name.
        Parameters:
        name - The player name
        Returns:
        The player found by the name given
        Throws:
        PlayerException - if no player was found

      • sendAll

        public static void sendAll(java.lang.String toSend)
        Sends a message to all players for the Collection of players.
        Parameters:
        toSend - the message to send

      • sendOthers

        public static void sendOthers(java.lang.String toSend,
                              Player toIgnore)
        Sends a message to everyone except one player.
        Parameters:
        toSend - The message to send
        toIgnore - The player to ignore

      • getAll

        public static java.util.List<Player> getAll(java.lang.String ip)
        Returns all the players having the given InetAddress.
        Parameters:
        ip - The InetAddress to filer players
        Returns:
        All the players with the given InetAddress

      • checkAvailable

        public static boolean checkAvailable(java.lang.String name)
        Checks if a name is available.
        Parameters:
        name - The name to check
        Returns:
        the result

      • isBanned

        public static boolean isBanned(java.lang.String ip)
        Checks if an InetAddress is banned.
        Parameters:
        ip - The InetAddress to check
        Returns:
        if the InetAddress is banned

      • getPlayers

        public static java.util.Vector<Player> getPlayers()
        Returns:
        The Vector of players

      • forEach

        public static void forEach(java.util.function.Consumer<? super Player> action)
        Executes a Consumer for all the players.
        Parameters:
        action - The Consumer to execute

      • disconnectAll

        public static void disconnectAll(java.lang.String message)
        Disconnects all the players with a given reason.
        Parameters:
        message - the reason for the disconnect
